snippet.title: Planet Colonization Trailer - Management Game on RTS Platform
snippet.description:
Planet Colonization on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1203490/Planet_Colonization/

Planet Colonization is a real time society management and strategy game for PC.  

Explore the planet and find natural resources. Build civic, industrial and strategic buildings and employ your colonists.

Trade products and armaments and take advantage of price changes.

Define your socioeconomic model: Taxes, salaries, education etc. Let your colonists establish their own businesses or build the buildings yourself.

Defend your colony with armed forces and eliminate the enemy colonies.

The game will be released in the near future.
https://twitter.com/plcolonization
info@planetcolonization.com
